title: Looking for someone to climb with :-)
body: So yeah, i am a really good player(deserve to be in diamond) and i had trouble climbing by myself due to my internet connection that would lag/disconnect  and now finally ive got fiber and i dont have any more of those problems, but i get bored playing by myself with randoms and would like to find someone as good as me to climb with. Iam currently Gold 2 and my best roles are jungle,mid,top,adc in that order. feel free to add me

replies.body: i cant even tell if this post is a joke or not
